mapper.select:
SELECT
g.*
count(1) AS record_count
from (SELECT t.SUPPLIER_CODE supplierCode,t.SUPPLIER_NAME supplierName,t.COMPANY_SITE supplierSite
FROM supplier t left join merchandise t1 on t1.SUPPLIER_CODE=t.SUPPLIER_CODE
1=1
AND UPPER(t.SUPPLIER_CODE) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{supplierCode}||'%')
AND UPPER(t.SUPPLIER_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{supplierName}||'%')
AND UPPER(t1.MERCHANDISE_CODE) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{goodsCode}||'%')
AND UPPER(t1.MERCHANDISE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{goodsName}||'%')
group by t.SUPPLIER_CODE,t.SUPPLIER_NAME,t.COMPANY_SITE ) g
ORDER BY ${app_orderby}
ORDER BY g.supplierCode desc

SELECT
g.*
count(1) AS record_count
from (SELECT (#{minDate}||'-'||#{maxDate}) sjsjfw,t.SUPPLIER_CODE supplierCode,t.SUPPLIER_NAME supplierName, round(t1.xsl,2) xsl, round(t1.xsje,2) xsje,round(t1.mle,2) mle, to_char(round((t1.xsl*100.00/(case when t1.zxsl=0 then 1 else t1.zxsl end)),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xslzball, to_char(round ((t1.xsje*100.00/t1.zxsje),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xsjezball, to_char(round ((t1.mle*100.00/t1.zmle),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as mlezball,
to_char(round ((t1.xsl*100.00/t1.xflzxl),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xslzbxfl, to_char(round ((t1.xsje*100.00/t1.xflzxsje),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xsjezbxfl, to_char(round ((t1.mle*100.00/t1.xflzmle),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as mlezbxfl, to_char(round ((t1.xsl*100.00/t1.mxlzxl),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xslzbmxl, to_char(round ((t1.xsje*100.00/t1.mxlzxsje),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xsjezbmxl, to_char(round ((t1.mle*100.00/t1.mxlzmle),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as mlezbmxl,
to_char(round ((t1.xsl*100.00/t1.xflzxl),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xslzbxfl, to_char(round ((t1.xsje*100.00/t1.xflzxsje),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xsjezbxfl, to_char(round ((t1.mle*100.00/t1.xflzmle),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as mlezbxfl, '' as xslzbmxl,'' as xsjezbmxl,'' as mlezbmxl,
'' as xslzbxfl,'' as xsjezbxfl,'' as mlezbxfl,'' as xslzbmxl,'' as xsjezbmxl,'' as mlezbmxl,
to_char(round ((t1.xsl*1.00/t1.xsdt),2),'fm9999999990.00') psdxl, to_char(round ((t1.xsje*1.00/t1.xsdt),2),'fm9999999990.00') psdxsje, to_char(round ((t1.mle*1.00/t1.xsdt),2),'fm9999999990.00') psdml, t2.mdszh qxs,t2.qxdt,t1.xsdt, to_char(round ((CASE WHEN (t1.xsdt*100.00/t2.qxdt)>100 then 100 else (t1.xsdt*100.00/t2.qxdt) END),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as hyd, t2.amds,t2.bmds,t2.cmds,t2.dmds,t3.jhl,t3.jhe,to_char(round ((t14.jsdhsl*100.00/t12.ddzs),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as ddjsl, to_char(round ((t13.shzl*100.00/t12.dhzl),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as ddmzl, t11.rbjssl,t11.rbjscs,t5.zlxj, t6.zhcs,t6.zhsl,t7.zhskugs,t8.gysndqwyks,t9.gysxcpf,round(t9.zdmj,2) zdmj, round(t9.cjmj,2) cjmj,round(t9.nzcz,2) nzcz,round(t9.qyzrs,0) qyzrs,t10.gyskpdf, t10.gyskpdfph,(nvl(t4.gysyxps1,0)+nvl(t41.gysyxps2,0)) gysyxps,t15.cjbhgcs,t15.cjbhgcs cjbhgskus
from SUPPLIER t
left join (select supplierCode,--供应商编号 sum(SELL_QUANTITY) xsl,--供应商销售量 sum(SELL_TOTAL_PRICE) xsje,--供应商销售金额 sum(SELL_PROFIT) mle,--供应商毛利额 sum(SELL_STORE_QUANTITY) xsdt, --供应商总销售店天 ( select sum(SELL_QUANTITY) from (select k.SELL_QUANTITY * nvl(k1.NET_WEIGHT, 1) SELL_QUANTITY, SELL_TOTAL_PRICE, SELL_PROFIT, k.supplier_code supplierCode from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k.sell_month >= #{minDate} and k.sell_month <= #{maxDate} and ( (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=10000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=59999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=70000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=79999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=814000000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=814999999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=900000000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=999999999) ) )) zxsl, ( select sum(SELL_TOTAL_PRICE) from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k.sell_month >=#{minDate} and k.sell_month <=#{maxDate} and ( (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=10000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=59999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=70000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=79999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=814000000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=814999999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=900000000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=999999999) )) zxsje, --总销售金额 ( select sum(SELL_PROFIT) from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k.sell_month >=#{minDate} and k.sell_month <=#{maxDate} and ( (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=10000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=59999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=70000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=79999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=814000000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=814999999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=900000000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=999999999) )) zmle, --总毛利额 (select sum(SELL_QUANTITY) xflzxl from (select k.SELL_QUANTITY * nvl(k1.net_weight, 1) SELL_QUANTITY from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k1.small_type_code=#{smallTypeCode} and k.sell_month >= #{minDate} and k.sell_month <= #{maxDate}) ) xflzxl,--小分类总销量 (select sum(SELL_QUANTITY) mxlzxl from (select k.SELL_QUANTITY * nvl(k1.net_weight, 1) SELL_QUANTITY from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k1.small_type_code=#{smallTypeCode} and k1.detail_type_code=#{detailTypeCode} and k.sell_month >= #{minDate} and k.sell_month <= #{maxDate}) ) mxlzxl,--明细类总销量 (select sum(SELL_TOTAL_PRICE) from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k1.small_type_code=#{smallTypeCode} and k.sell_month >= #{minDate} and k.sell_month <= #{maxDate}) xflzxsje ,--小分类总销售金额 (select sum(SELL_TOTAL_PRICE) from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k1.small_type_code=#{smallTypeCode} and k1.detail_type_code=#{detailTypeCode} and k.sell_month >= #{minDate} and k.sell_month <= #{maxDate}) mxlzxsje, --明细类总销售金额 (select sum(SELL_PROFIT) from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k1.small_type_code=#{smallTypeCode} and k1.detail_type_code=#{detailTypeCode} and k.sell_month >= #{minDate} and k.sell_month <= #{maxDate}) mxlzmle, --明细类总毛利 (select sum(SELL_PROFIT) from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k1.small_type_code=#{smallTypeCode} and k.sell_month >= #{minDate} and k.sell_month <= #{maxDate}) xflzmle --小分类总毛利 from (select k.SELL_QUANTITY * nvl(k1.NET_WEIGHT, 1) SELL_QUANTITY, SELL_TOTAL_PRICE, SELL_PROFIT, SELL_STORE_QUANTITY, k.supplier_code supplierCode from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k.sell_month >= #{minDate} and k.sell_month <= #{maxDate} ) where supplierCode in (${supplierCode}) group by supplierCode) t1 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t1.supplierCode left join
(select mer.supplier_code supplierCode,(sum(A_STORE_QUANTITY)+sum(B_STORE_QUANTITY)+sum(C_STORE_QUANTITY)+sum(D_STORE_QUANTITY)) mdszh ,sum(PERMISSION_STORE_QUANTITY) qxdt,sum(A_STORE_QUANTITY) amds,sum(B_STORE_QUANTITY) bmds,sum(C_STORE_QUANTITY) cmds,sum(D_STORE_QUANTITY) dmds from MERCHANDISE_JH_PERMISSION mjp inner join MERCHANDISE mer on mjp.merchandise_code=mer.merchandise_code where to_char(mjp.permission_date,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(mjp.permission_date,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND mer.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by mer.supplier_code ) t2 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t2.supplierCode--门店数总和，权限店天，ABCD门店数（分别) left join (select mr.supplier_code supplierCode,sum(mr.receipt_rationed) jhl,sum(mr.receipt_total_price) jhe from ( select (mer.receipt_rationed * nvl(k1.net_weight, 1)) receipt_rationed,mer.receipt_total_price,mer.reality_receipt_date,mer.supplier_code from MERCHANDISE_RECEIPT mer inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (mer.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and mer.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code)) mr where to_char(mr.reality_receipt_date,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(mr.reality_receipt_date,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND mr.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by mr.supplier_code) t3 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t3.supplierCode--进货量，进货额 left join (select ism.INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE supplierCode,count(1) gysyxps1 from(select INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE,INTENTION_CODE from ACCESSORY_QUOTED_ELECTRONIC where to_char(created,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(created,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND intention_supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE,INTENTION_CODE) ism group by ism.INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE) t4 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t4.supplierCode--供应商意向品数辅料 left join (select ism1.INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE supplierCode,count(1) gysyxps2 from(select INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE,INTENTION_CODE from MERCHANDISE_QUOTED where to_char(created,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(created,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND intention_supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE,INTENTION_CODE) ism1 group by ism1.INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE) t41 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t41.supplierCode--供应商意向品数商品 left join (select sl.supplier_code supplierCode ,sl.quality_level zlxj from SUPPLIER_QUALITY_LEVEL sl where sl.quality_level_year=#{lastYear} AND sl.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}))t5 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t5.supplierCode--供应商质量星级 left join (select mrec.supplier_code supplierCode,count(1) zhcs,sum(RECYCLE_COUNT)zhsl from MERCHANDISE_RECYCLE mrec where to_char(mrec.recycle_date,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(mrec.recycle_date,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND mrec.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by mrec.supplier_code)t6 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t6.supplierCode--供应商召回次数，召回数量 left join (select merc1.supplier_code supplierCode,count(merc1.merchandise_code) zhskugs from( select mrec.supplier_code,mrec.merchandise_code from MERCHANDISE_RECYCLE mrec where to_char(mrec.recycle_date,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(mrec.recycle_date,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND mrec.supplier_code in (${supplierCode})group by mrec.supplier_code,mrec.merchandise_code)merc1 group by merc1.supplier_code ) t7 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t7.supplierCode--供应商召回sku个数 left join (select scom.supplier_code supplierCode,sum(COMPLAINTS_COUNT) gysndqwyks from SUPPLIER_COMPLAINTS scom where scom.complaints_year=#{lastYear} AND scom.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by scom.supplier_code) t8 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t8.supplierCode--供应商千万元客诉 left join (select svf.supplier_code supplierCode,avg(svf.score) gysxcpf,avg(svf.FLOOR_AREA) zdmj,avg(svf.PLANT_AREA) cjmj,avg(svf.YEAR_TOTAL_OUTPUT) nzcz,avg(svf.ENTERPRISE_COUNT_PEOPLE) qyzrs from SUPPLIER_VISIT_FACTORY svf where to_char(svf.visit_factory_date,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(svf.visit_factory_date,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND svf.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by svf.supplier_code)t9 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t9.supplierCode--供应商巡查评分 left join (select ses1.supplier_code supplierCode,ses1.evaluate_item_score gyskpdf,rank() over(order by ses1.evaluate_item_score desc) as gyskpdfph from SUPPLIER_EVALUATE_SCORE ses1 where created =(select max(created) from SUPPLIER_EVALUATE_SCORE ses2 where ses2.supplier_code=ses1.supplier_code and to_char(ses2.created,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(ses2.created,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND ses1.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}))) t10 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t10.supplierCode--供应商考评得分及排名 left join (select conre.supplier_code supplierCode ,sum(CONCESSION_RECEIVE_COUNT) rbjssl,count(1) rbjscs from CONCESSION_RECEIVE conre where to_char(conre.APPLICATION_DATE,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(conre.APPLICATION_DATE,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND conre.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by conre.supplier_code) t11 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t11.supplierCode--让步接收数量，次数 left join (select supplier_code supplierCode,sum(ORDER_QUANTITY) dhzl,count(1) ddzs from MERCHANDISE_ORDER where to_char(EXPECT_ARRIVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(EXPECT_ARRIVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND ORDER_QUANTITY >=0 AND supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by supplier_code ) t12 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t12.supplierCode--供应商订货总量,订单总数 left join (select MR.supplier_code supplierCode,sum(MR.RECEIPT_RATIONED) shzl from MERCHANDISE_RECEIPT MR inner join MERCHANDISE_ORDER MO on MR.ORDER_CODE=MO.ORDER_CODE and MR.SUPPLIER_CODE = MO.SUPPLIER_CODE and MR.MERCHANDISE_CODE = MO.MERCHANDISE_CODE where MR.RECEIPT_RATIONED>=0 AND MO.ORDER_QUANTITY>=0 AND to_char(MR.REALITY_RECEIPT_DATE,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(MR.REALITY_RECEIPT_DATE,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND MR.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by MR.supplier_code ) t13 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t13.supplierCode--供应商收货总量 left join (select mero.supplier_code supplierCode,count(1) jsdhsl from (select * from MERCHANDISE_ORDER where to_char(EXPECT_ARRIVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(EXPECT_ARRIVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND supplier_code in (${supplierCode})) mero inner join MERCHANDISE_RECEIPT merr on mero.order_code=merr.order_code and mero.SUPPLIER_CODE=merr.SUPPLIER_CODE and mero.MERCHANDISE_CODE=merr.MERCHANDISE_CODE AND mero.ORDER_QUANTITY>=0 and to_char(merr.reality_receipt_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')<=to_char(mero.expect_arrive_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by mero.supplier_code ) t14 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t14.supplierCode--供应商及时到货订单数 left join (select merunq.supplier_code supplierCode,count(1) cjbhgcs from MERCHANDISE_UNQUALIFIED merunq where to_char(merunq.SPOT_CHECK_DATE,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate} and to_char(merunq.SPOT_CHECK_DATE,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate} AND merunq.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by merunq.supplier_code)t15 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t15.supplierCode--供应商抽检不合格次数，抽检不合格数量
1=1
AND t.supplier_code in (${supplierCode})
Union SELECT
(#{minDate1}||'-'||#{maxDate1}) sjsjfw,t.SUPPLIER_CODE supplierCode,t.SUPPLIER_NAME supplierName,round(t1.xsl,2) xsl, round(t1.xsje,2) xsje,round(t1.mle,2) mle,to_char(round((t1.xsl*100.00/(case when t1.zxsl=0 then 1 else t1.zxsl end)),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xslzball,to_char(round ((t1.xsje*100.00/t1.zxsje),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xsjezball, to_char(round ((t1.mle*100.00/t1.zmle),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as mlezball, to_char(round ((t1.xsl*100.00/t1.xflzxl),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xslzbxfl,to_char(round ((t1.xsje*100.00/t1.xflzxsje),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xsjezbxfl, to_char(round ((t1.mle*100.00/t1.xflzmle),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as mlezbxfl,to_char(round ((t1.xsl*100.00/t1.mxlzxl),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xslzbmxl,to_char(round ((t1.xsje*100.00/t1.mxlzxsje),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xsjezbmxl, to_char(round ((t1.mle*100.00/t1.mxlzmle),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as mlezbmxl, to_char(round ((t1.xsl*100.00/t1.xflzxl),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xslzbxfl,to_char(round ((t1.xsje*100.00/t1.xflzxsje),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as xsjezbxfl, to_char(round ((t1.mle*100.00/t1.xflzmle),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as mlezbxfl,'' as xslzbmxl,'' as xsjezbmxl, '' as mlezbmxl,
'' as xslzbxfl,'' as xsjezbxfl,'' as mlezbxfl,'' as xslzbmxl,'' as xsjezbmxl,'' as mlezbmxl,
to_char(round ((t1.xsl*1.00/t1.xsdt),2),'fm9999999990.00') psdxl,to_char(round ((t1.xsje*1.00/t1.xsdt),2),'fm9999999990.00') psdxsje,to_char(round ((t1.mle*1.00/t1.xsdt),2),'fm9999999990.00') psdml,t2.mdszh qxs,t2.qxdt,t1.xsdt, to_char(round ((CASE WHEN (t1.xsdt*100.00/t2.qxdt)>100 then 100 else (t1.xsdt*100.00/t2.qxdt) END),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as hyd,t2.amds,t2.bmds,t2.cmds,t2.dmds,t3.jhl,t3.jhe,to_char(round ((t14.jsdhsl*100.00/t12.ddzs),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as ddjsl,to_char(round ((t13.shzl*100.00/t12.dhzl),2),'fm9999999990.00')||'%' as ddmzl,t11.rbjssl,t11.rbjscs,t5.zlxj, t6.zhcs,t6.zhsl,t7.zhskugs,t8.gysndqwyks,t9.gysxcpf,round(t9.zdmj,2) zdmj,round(t9.cjmj,2) cjmj,round(t9.nzcz,2) nzcz,round(t9.qyzrs,0) qyzrs,t10.gyskpdf,t10.gyskpdfph,(nvl(t4.gysyxps1,0)+nvl(t41.gysyxps2,0)) gysyxps,t15.cjbhgcs,t15.cjbhgcs cjbhgskus
from SUPPLIER t
left join (select supplierCode,--供应商编号 sum(SELL_QUANTITY) xsl,--供应商销售量 sum(SELL_TOTAL_PRICE) xsje,--供应商销售金额 sum(SELL_PROFIT) mle,--供应商毛利额 sum(SELL_STORE_QUANTITY) xsdt, --供应商总销售店天 ( select sum(SELL_QUANTITY) from (select k.SELL_QUANTITY * nvl(k1.NET_WEIGHT, 1) SELL_QUANTITY, SELL_TOTAL_PRICE, SELL_PROFIT, k.supplier_code supplierCode from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k.sell_month >= #{minDate1} and k.sell_month <= #{maxDate1} and ( (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=10000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=59999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=70000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=79999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=814000000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=814999999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=900000000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=999999999) ) )) zxsl, ( select sum(SELL_TOTAL_PRICE) from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k.sell_month >=#{minDate1} and k.sell_month <=#{maxDate1} and ( (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=10000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=59999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=70000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=79999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=814000000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=814999999) or (k.MERCHANDISE_CODE>=900000000 and k.MERCHANDISE_CODE<=999999999) )) zxsje, --总销售金额 ( select sum(SELL_PROFIT) from MERCHANDISE_SELL_D_J_MONTH k inner join MERCHANDISE k1 on (k.merchandise_code = k1.merchandise_code and k.supplier_code=k1.supplier_code) where k.sell_month >=#{minDate1} and ism1.INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE supplierCode,count(1) gysyxps2 from(select INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE,INTENTION_CODE from MERCHANDISE_QUOTED where to_char(created,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate1} and t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t6.supplierCode--供应商召回次数，召回数量 left join (select merc1.supplier_code supplierCode,count(merc1.merchandise_code) zhskugs from( select mrec.supplier_code,mrec.merchandise_code from ism1.INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE supplierCode,count(1) gysyxps2 from(select INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE,INTENTION_CODE from MERCHANDISE_QUOTED where to_char(created,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate2} and to_char(created,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate2} AND intention_supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE,INTENTION_CODE) ism1 group by ism1.INTENTION_SUPPLIER_CODE) t41 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t41.supplierCode--供应商意向品数商品 left join (select sl.supplier_code supplierCode ,sl.quality_level zlxj from SUPPLIER_QUALITY_LEVEL sl where sl.quality_level_year=#{lastYear2} AND t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t6.supplierCode--供应商召回次数，召回数量 left join (select merc1.supplier_code supplierCode,count(merc1.merchandise_code) zhskugs from( select mrec.supplier_code,mrec.merchandise_code from MERCHANDISE_RECYCLE mrec where to_char(mrec.recycle_date,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate2} and to_char(mrec.recycle_date,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate2} AND mrec.supplier_code in (${supplierCode})group by mrec.supplier_code,mrec.merchandise_code)merc1 group by merc1.supplier_code ) t7 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t7.supplierCode--供应商召回sku个数 left join (select scom.supplier_code supplierCode,sum(COMPLAINTS_COUNT) gysndqwyks from SUPPLIER_COMPLAINTS scom where scom.complaints_year=#{lastYear2} AND scom.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by scom.supplier_code) t8 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t8.supplierCode--供应商千万元客诉 left join (select svf.supplier_code supplierCode,avg(svf.score) gysxcpf,avg(svf.FLOOR_AREA) zdmj,avg(svf.PLANT_AREA) cjmj,avg(svf.YEAR_TOTAL_OUTPUT) nzcz,avg(svf.ENTERPRISE_COUNT_PEOPLE) qyzrs from SUPPLIER_VISIT_FACTORY svf where to_char(svf.visit_factory_date,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate2} and to_char(svf.visit_factory_date,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate2} AND svf.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by svf.supplier_code)t9 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t9.supplierCode--供应商巡查评分 left join (select ses1.supplier_code supplierCode,ses1.evaluate_item_score ses2.supplier_code=ses1.supplier_code and to_char(ses2.created,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate2} and to_char(ses2.created,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate2} AND ses1.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}))) t10 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t10.supplierCode--供应商考评得分及排名 left join (select conre.supplier_code supplierCode ,sum(CONCESSION_RECEIVE_COUNT) rbjssl,count(1) rbjscs from CONCESSION_RECEIVE conre where t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t11.supplierCode--让步接收数量，次数 left join (select supplier_code supplierCode,sum(ORDER_QUANTITY) dhzl,count(1) ddzs from MERCHANDISE_ORDER where to_char(MR.REALITY_RECEIPT_DATE,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate2} and to_char(MR.REALITY_RECEIPT_DATE,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate2} AND MR.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by MR.supplier_code ) t13 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t13.supplierCode--供应商收货总量 left join (select mero.supplier_code supplierCode,count(1) jsdhsl from (select * from MERCHANDISE_ORDER where to_char(EXPECT_ARRIVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate2} and to_char(EXPECT_ARRIVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate2} AND supplier_code in (${supplierCode})) mero inner join MERCHANDISE_RECEIPT merr on mero.order_code=merr.order_code and mero.SUPPLIER_CODE=merr.SUPPLIER_CODE and mero.MERCHANDISE_CODE=merr.MERCHANDISE_CODE AND mero.ORDER_QUANTITY>=0 and to_char(merr.reality_receipt_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')<=to_char(mero.expect_arrive_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by mero.supplier_code ) t14 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t14.supplierCode--供应商及时到货订单数 left join (select to_char(merunq.SPOT_CHECK_DATE,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate2} AND merunq.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by merunq.supplier_code)t15 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t15.supplierCode--供应商抽检不合格次数，抽检不合格数量

merunq.supplier_code supplierCode,count(1) cjbhgcs from MERCHANDISE_UNQUALIFIED merunq where to_char(merunq.SPOT_CHECK_DATE,'YYYY-MM')>=#{minDate3} and to_char(merunq.SPOT_CHECK_DATE,'YYYY-MM')<=#{maxDate3} AND merunq.supplier_code in (${supplierCode}) group by merunq.supplier_code)t15 on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=t15.supplierCode--供应商抽检不合格次数，抽检不合格数量
1=1
AND t.supplier_code in (${supplierCode})
) g
ORDER BY ${app_orderby}
ORDER BY g.sjsjfw desc
